original_solution_mapping.L1: Every other tree is half the trees, so there will be 18 / 2 = <<18/2=9>>9 fruit trees planted.
original_solution_mapping.L2: The association is planting three kinds of fruit trees, so they will plant 9 / 3 = <<9/3=3>>3 of each kind of tree.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 4482.
    Returns: the number of each kind of fruit tree planted.
    """
    # L1
    total_streets = 18 # There are eighteen streets in the neighborhood
    every_other_divisor = 2 # Every other tree is half the trees
    fruit_trees = total_streets / every_other_divisor

    # L2
    kinds_of_fruit_trees = 3 # equal numbers of plum, pear, and apricot trees
    trees_per_kind = fruit_trees / kinds_of_fruit_trees

    # FA
    answer = trees_per_kind
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Every other tree is half the trees, so there will be {total_streets} / {every_other_divisor} = <<{total_streets}/{every_other_divisor}={fruit_trees}>>{fruit_trees} fruit trees planted.

The association is planting three kinds of fruit trees, so they will plant {fruit_trees} / {kinds_of_fruit_trees} = <<{fruit_trees}/{kinds_of_fruit_trees}={trees_per_kind}>>{trees_per_kind} of each kind of tree.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: Every other tree is half the trees, so there will be 18 / 2 = <<18/2=9>>9 fruit trees planted.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: The association is planting three kinds of fruit trees, so they will plant 3 / 3 = <<3/3=1>>1 of each kind of tree.

explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'kinds_of_fruit_trees' (value: 3) was used instead of 'fruit_trees' (value: 9.0).
